Title: La Grande Illusion
Writer: Charles Spaak (scenario and dialogue), Jean Renoir (scenario and dialogue)
Actors: Jean Gabin, Dita Parlo, Pierre Fresnay, Erich von Stroheim
Plot: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 1 nomination.
